document_data.name: Hurricane lamp
document_data.mainbody: A '''hurricane lamp''' was a type of [[lamp]] with a glass chimney to protect the flame against the wind.
document_data.Description:
The hurricane lamp design included a glass cylinder around the flame, which served to protect it from being blown out by wind, be it accidentally from a breeze or some sudden rapid motion from the bearer, or intentionally, even if from a magic effect such as a ''[[gust of wind]]'' spell.

A variety of adorned hurricane lamps with a [[Dwarf|dwarven]]-made mechanism to raise and lower the [[wick]] was available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
